Mastering Google Assistant: Basic Commands

Google Assistant is a powerful tool that can help you with various tasks using simple voice commands. Here is a comprehensive list of basic commands to get you started with controlling your device, managing your schedule, and more.

Stop and Pause

  • Stop playing
    • â€œOK Google, stop.â€
  • Pause
    • â€œOK Google, pause.â€
    • â€œOK Google, resume.â€

Control the Volume

  • â€œOK Google, increase volume.â€
  • â€œOK Google, volume up.â€
  • â€œOK Google, decrease volume.â€
  • â€œOK Google, volume down.â€

Ask for Help

  • â€œOK Google, help.â€
  • â€œOK Google, what can you do?â€

Repeat the Last Phrase

  • â€œOK Google, repeat.â€

Change Google Assistantâ€™s Voice

  • â€œOK Google, change your voice.â€

Combine Commands

  • â€œOK Google, what is the time, and whatâ€™s the weather?â€

Bluetooth

  • Pair a Bluetooth device
    • â€œOK Google, pair Bluetooth.â€
  • Connect to a Bluetooth device
    • â€œOK Google, connect.â€
    • â€œOK Google, connect to my phone.â€
  • Disconnect from a Bluetooth device
    • â€œOK Google, disconnect.â€
    • â€œOK Google, disconnect from my phone.â€

  • Hear information about agenda/Calendar
